name: 2021 Alberta Press Conference Simulator
description:
Assume the role as a member of Alberta's press and get ready to report! 

Simulated to the fullest of details, 2021 Alberta Press Conference Simulator is a hyper-real, greater than life experience of what it is like to patiently wait for the Honourable Premier to address the people of Alberta.

Have your pen and paper ready along with any burning questions you might want to ask — The Premier will be arriving any minute now.

#ableg #abpoli #WhereIsKenney

CREDITS

Shane Berezowski — Programming, 3D Modeling

Elijah Lucian — Audio

Shane got lazy and tired and found a pre-canned model of a hand sanitizer bottle to modify. "Basic bottle" by Blender3D is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution. https://skfb.ly/6SBZI To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/.

Flag of Canada: MapGrid., Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
